extension.name: System - FLEXIcontent Advanced Routing
extension.author: Emmanuel Danan
extension.description: System Plugin for FLEXIcontent Advanced Routing

field.default:
Hide Categories from Pathway/URLs for Types

-- These are types that contain content not being a part of structure but rather general information content like site usage instructions or license agreement, etc

Hide categories in Content / Content Listings by NOT displaying:
a. direct category links
b. category title as a content/content list markup

-- These categories are for special purposes, e.g. contain items displayed in frontpage or in a module Slideshow.

Language switch associated items/categories
(categories in J2.5 only)
field.description: This feature allows to be able to switch associated item/category translations, without need to create associated menu items for each of the items/categories

field.name: lang_switch_items
field.label: Switch items
field.description: Associated items that translate the same content will be on the fly switched when language changes

field.name: lang_switch_cats
field.label: Switch categories
field.description: Categories will be redirected to their filtered category views

field.name: debug_lang_switch
field.label: Debug language switching
field.description: A message will be displayed when item or category (J2.5) view is redirected
